course_description: This course will begin the development of fundamental topics in probability theory and its applications in combinatorics and algorithms. Included will be: events and their probabilities, random variables and their distributions, limit theorems, martingales, concentration of probability, random walks and Markov chains.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - N301
sections: Class Nbr: 2914, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: D. Borthwick, Status: Open
